isis.stitle: Electrical System Troubleshooting Guide - 3300 Model - CAB FEATURES - post trip inspection circuits - EXTENDED DESCRIPTION

svcproc.title: EXTENDED DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: Refer to Post Trip Inspection Circuits.
The Post Trip Inspection system is armed when the following conditions are met:

item.para: Red pupil warning lights are activated

svcproc.para: To disarm the Post Trip Inspection system the following conditions must be met:

item.para: Open and close rear emergency exit

svcproc.para: The operator will have 60 seconds to disarm the Post Trip Inspection system. If the system is not disarmed in time, then the electric horn will pulse and the headlights will flash for twenty minutes. The Post Trip Inspection system can be disarmed at any time by following the steps above.
If the Post Trip Inspection system was not armed during operation of the CE Bus, then the system will not need to be disarmed.
